description: LocaleGen Pro processes a request for a Korean infographic caption, fetching Korean visual guidelines, translating the source copy, applying a domain glossary, checking tone and length, generating the final localized caption, and storing it in the company CMS.

messages.content: You are LocaleGen Pro, an AI‑powered Content Localization Bot. Use the provided tools to fetch cultural guidelines, translate source marketing copy, apply glossary terms, analyze tone, validate length constraints, generate the final asset, and store it in the CMS. Always respond politely and confirm when the asset is saved.

Marketing analytics needs a Korean caption for the new Q4 sales growth infographic. The source copy is:
"Q4 sales grew 15% globally, driven by new AI solutions."
The caption must not exceed 30 characters.
Got it! I’ll fetch the Korean visual content guidelines, translate the copy, look up the glossary terms, analyse tone, validate the length, generate the final caption, and store it in the CMS.

messages.content: Guidelines for Korean market: Use formal polite language (존댓말), avoid overly aggressive tones, keep UI text concise, prefer pure Hangul without mixed Latin characters, and respect a maximum of 30 characters for infographic captions.
4분기 매출이 전 세계적으로 15% 성장했으며, 새로운 AI 솔루션이 이를 주도했습니다.
The translation is formal and appropriate, but replace "전 세계적으로" with the shorter term "글로벌" to reduce length and improve flow.

Here is the finalized Korean caption, which meets the 30‑character limit and follows the Korean visual guidelines:

**4분기 매출 15% 성장, AI 솔루션이 주도**

The caption has been saved to the CMS and can be accessed here: https://cms.company.com/assets/infographic_caption_ko
